name: ShapeQuest
description:
Welcome to ShapeQuest! You are on a quest to defeat the enemy circle nation before they take over PolyTown!

To Play:
Use WASD for movement, and aim and click to shoot
Aiming and clicking is also used to interact with other people!

(This is just a prototype for me to learn this type of game, I may or may not expand upon this in the future)

Thanks to Musicka for the music!
